      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleActivationLayer<T extends SimpleActivationLayer<T>>
      A parent class for all stateless, univariate "activation" functions.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbsActivationLayer
      The Absolute Value.
      class  BinaryEntropyActivationLayer
      The type Binary entropy activation layer.
      class  EntropyLayer
      The type Entropy layer.
      class  GaussianActivationLayer
      This activation layer uses the unit gaussian curve.
      class  LogActivationLayer
      A y=log(abs(x)) activation function.
      class  MaxConstLayer
      Enforces a maximum-value constraint on the input signal, rounding down any values exceeding a setByCoord threshold.
      class  SigmoidActivationLayer
      The classic activation function, either "sigmoid" or "tanh" dependiong on the setting of "balanced".
      class  SinewaveActivationLayer
      Calculates y=sin(x) in radians apply signed unit amplitude.
      class  SqActivationLayer
      Specialized square activation function.
